ScriptGroup.name: Asteria UI
ScriptGroup.script: -- A customizable, modular user interface for Asteria.

Script.name: UI Variables
Script.script:
-- All variables and tables that allow the UI to function are at least created here, though sometimes defined elsewhere.
-- Namespace
asui = asui or {} asui.version = asui.version or "2.0" asui.container = asui.container or {}
-- Char / Stat Box Variables
-- Group Table
-- Pet Table
-- Aff and Def Box Variables
-- Defense Variable
-- Mob Info Box Variables
-- Being Data Variables
-- Inventory Box Variables
-- Inventory Data Variables
-- Toggles
-- User Defined Settings
asui.settings = asui.settings or { light = "activate lantern", heal = "drink health", retreat = "retreat", recall = "recall", build = "Not Defined", fonttype = "Ubuntu Mono", leftborderpercent = 0.20, leftpad = 0, rightborderpercent = 0.30, rightpad = 0, tabfontsize = 15, bodyfontsize = 10, chatfontsize = 10, toggleState = {Group = true, Light = false}, groupthm = 70, groupthl = 40, }
-- Custom Colors
asui.settings.colors = asui.settings.colors or { exp = "OrangeRed", emphasis = "light_goldenrod", divider = "white", header = "DeepSkyBlue", highhp = "DarkGreen", midhp = "yellow", lowhp = "red", highmp = "DarkGreen", midmp = "yellow", lowmp = "red", gold = "yellow", worn = "green", tab = "DimGray", guild = "cyan", build = "white", players = "cyan", legends = "yellow", hostiles = "red", innocents = "LightSkyBlue", peacefuls = "cyan", activetab = "DarkGreen", inactivetab = "bisque", inactivetoggle = "Black", activetoggle = "DimGrey", offborder = "white", onborder = "LimeGreen", lowcount = "DarkOrange", highcount = "cyan", defense = "green", affliction = "red" }
-- Vitals
asui.vitals = asui.vitals or { curhealth = 50, maxhealth = 100, curmana = 50, maxmana = 100 }
-- Gauge Variables
asui.useGauges = asui.useGauges or { enabled = enabled or true }
-- Chat Variables
